pages.text: Ni shuo: Nimen yingdang zai da dishang luxing, yin'er guancha qian ren de jieju shi zenyang de. Tamen daban shi yi wu pei zhu de.
Zai buke kangju de rizi cong zhenzhu lailin yiqian, ni yingdang quxiang zhengjiao, zai na ri, tamen jiang bici fenli.
Bu xindao zhe, jiang zi shou qi bu xin de e bao, xingshan zhe zhi wei ziji yubei anzhai,
yibian zhenzhu yong ta de endian qu baochou xindao erqie xingshan zhe. Zhenzhu que shi bu xi'ai bu xindao zhe de.
Ta de yizhong jixiang shi: Ta paiqian feng lai chuanda jiayin, shi nimen changshi ta de enhui, shi chuanbo feng ta de mingling er hangxing, yibian nimen xunqiu ta de enhui, yibian nimen ganxie.
Zai ni zhiqian, wo que yi paiqianle xuduo shizhe, qu jiaohua tamen de zongzu, naxie shizhe jiu zhaoshi tamen xuduo mingzheng, ranhou, wo chengzhi fanzui de ren. Yuanzhu xinshi, yuan shi wo de zeren.

Zhenzhu pai feng qu xingqi yun lai, ranhou, renyi di shi yun sanbu zai tiankong, bingqie ba yun fencheng suipian, ni jiu kanjian yu cong yun zhong luoxia. Dang ta shi yu luo zai tasuo yiyu de pu ren shang de shihou, tamen like huanle,
jishi zai jiangyu zhiqian, tamen que shi jusang de.
Ni kan zhenzhu de enhui de xiaoguo ba! Ta zenyang shi yi si de dadi fuhuo, na que shi neng qisihuisheng de. Ta duiyu wanshi shi quanneng de.
